scene_description_enriched: Two shepherds stand in a pastoral landscape, tending to a flock of sheep. The shepherd on the left wears a red tunic with gold embellishments and a turban-like head covering. The shepherd on the right wears a blue tunic with gold patterns and a hooded cloak. Both hold staffs. Above them, in a blue cloud, an angel is depicted with golden rays emanating downwards, suggesting a divine revelation. The scene is framed by an ornate border.
